price: There have already come to them stories [of destroyed nations] that are sufficient to deter them,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
